scenario: I want to learn a new skill or subject.
problem: I want to learn the Python programming language from scratch. I have no prior coding experience and want to be able to build a simple web scraper within 30 days.
goal: Create a personalized 30-day learning plan for me, including daily topics, recommended resources (tutorials, videos, exercises), and a mini-project for each week.
constraints: The learning plan should require no more than 1-2 hours of study per day. All recommended resources must be free. The plan should be structured for a complete beginner.
chat_hints: Start by breaking down the learning process into four weeks. Week 1: Python basics (syntax, data types, control flow). Week 2: Data structures (lists, dictionaries) and functions. Week 3: Web scraping libraries (Beautiful Soup, Requests). Week 4: Building the web scraper project. Provide specific links to resources for each day's topic.
